title: A New Heaven and a New Earth
itunes:title: A New Heaven and a New Earth
description: The second reading for this Sunday, taken from the twenty-first chapter of the Book of Revelation, completes the Biblical story. The Bible tells us that the world will be transformed into a new heaven and a new earth through the One who "makes all things new."
